ygData.subject: Decepticons
ygData.msgSnippet: ooC: going back to calling Astrotrain -- Astroblast. -- Switchblade / Astroblast -- Switchblade smiles, and holds momentarily to to take in the devastation

ooC: going back to calling Astrotrain --> Astroblast.

-- Switchblade / Astroblast --

Switchblade smiles, and holds momentarily to to take in the 
devastation that Perceptor just felt. "Very well executed, 
Firestrike." 

He turns to Astroblast, "Astroblast, do you have any skill in 
repairs?"

Astroblast frowns, "No, I'm a fighter and personel carrier, not a 
engineer." The large bot crosses the room and takes a look at the 
control panel. He shudders, "Hah, I could sooner tear off Megatron's 
arm than fix this. You'll have to do it; unless you know someone 
else who can."

Switchblade curses, "Alright... Patrol the area, and inform me of 
anything that unusual." 

Astroblast saluts smartly, and exits the room, <better keep on his 
good side>. He walks down the hallways, small amounts of dust 
shuffle about on the floor as he passes, a sign of the ships 
appaerent missuse in the recent days.

Back in the control room;

The small bot turns back to Perceptor; more correctly the headless 
remains of Perceptor, "Firestrike, pick up this slag, and move him 
down to the lab and attach him in the usual fashion. I'll be down 
momentarily." He kicks Perceptor, ignoring the futility of the 
gesture, and walks over to the slagged control panel. He whips out 
his laser welders, and checks the power gauge noting that the'll 
need a recharge soon. "Hmm," he mumbles to himself as he begins 
pulling the mess appart.

Minutes later, having sorted out several wires, he begins to 
reattach the wire, attempting to get the power back online. Having 
no success with the first few wires, he continues.
